document.full_text: mark kerrigan, the brother of u.s. olympic figure skater nancy kerrigan, was acquitted on wednesday of manslaughter in the death of his 70-year-old father.
document.title: olympian's brother cleared of manslaughter in father's death
lines_and_colors: mark kerrigan, the brother of u.s. olympic figure skater nancy kerrigan, was acquitted on wednesday of manslaughter in the death of his 70-year-old father.
